name: Major Crush
description:
Summary:

You have one week to find a date to the end of the year summer bash. But wait that's the day after your final exam! Find a way to manage both studying for your test and winning over your crush! Have Fun!

Features:

  • 3 romantic interests
  • Multiple endings and choices
  • Character stats

Credits:

Afsha Shrestha @iirosewickii

  • Character artist, Screenwriter, Vfx artist, Concept artist

Jaena Neve Cabrera @jennys_wifi

  • Background artist, UI artist, Screenwriter, Concept artist

  • Programmer, Tech artist
